SqlDefinition.SqlCommand: UPDATE b_category SET Category_ID=@@Category_ID@@% <%=,Parent_Category_ID=@@Parent_Category_ID@@%> <%=,Category_Name_CH=@@Category_Name_CH@@%> <%=,Category_Name_HK=@@Category_Name_HK@@%> <%=,Category_Status=@@Category_Status@@%> <%=,Category_Seq=@@Category_Seq@@%> <%=,Update_Time=@@Update_Time@@%> <%=,Update_UserId=@@Update_UserId@@%> <%=,Update_User=@@Update_User@@%> WHERE Category_ID=@@Category_ID@@;

SELECT Category_ID,Parent_Category_ID,Category_Name_CH,Category_Name_HK,Category_Status,Category_Seq,Create_Time,Create_UserId,Create_User,Update_Time,Update_UserId,Update_User FROM b_category WHERE 1=1 <%= AND Category_ID=@@Category_ID@@%> <%= AND Parent_Category_ID=@@Parent_Category_ID@@%> <%= AND Category_Name_CH=@@Category_Name_CH@@%> <%= AND Category_Name_HK=@@Category_Name_HK@@%> <%= AND Category_Status=@@Category_Status@@%> <%= AND Category_Seq=@@Category_Seq@@%> <R%= LIMIT @@StartIndex@@, @@SelectCount@@ %R> ; SELECT COUNT(0) AS row_count FROM b_category WHERE 1=1 <%= AND Category_ID=@@Category_ID@@%> <%= AND Parent_Category_ID=@@Parent_Category_ID@@%> <%= AND Category_Name_CH=@@Category_Name_CH@@%> <%= AND Category_Name_HK=@@Category_Name_HK@@%> <%= AND Category_Status=@@Category_Status@@%> <%= AND Category_Seq=@@Category_Seq@@%> ;
